ch0062_00_karin/0101_0701_02_10:
I’m hoping you’ll do your best to
entertain me today.
ch0062_00_karin/0601_0701_01_10:
My love for Dark-type Pokémon
first began with my Umbreon.
ch0062_00_karin/0601_0701_02_10:
His elegant, piercing gaze and beautiful courage
won me over immediately.
ch0062_00_karin/0601_0701_03_10:
It wasn’t just his looks, though—he can put up
an incredible fight in a Pokémon battle.
ch0062_00_karin/0601_0701_04_10:
Feint Attack, Foul Play, Torment...
Our tactics must be infuriating for the Pokémon
on the other side of the battlefield.
ch0062_00_karin/0601_0701_05_10:
But I love the way so many Dark-type moves
work to outwit and counter the opponent.
ch0062_00_karin/0601_0702_01_10:
It’s kind of hard to put into words
what it is about Dark-type Pokémon
that fascinates me so...
ch0062_00_karin/0601_0702_02_10:
They’re so wild and adorable...
*sigh*
Words just don’t do them justice!
ch0062_00_karin/0602_0701_01_10:
I normally spend my days in the Kanto region
battling with the eager Trainers who come to
challenge the Elite Four.
ch0062_00_karin/0602_0701_02_10:
All sorts of Trainers come to test their skills
against me, but my Dark-type Pokémon and I
usually have them in the palm of our hand.
ch0062_00_karin/0602_0701_03_10:
When it comes to tactics, the possibilities are
endless—depending on your Pokémon’s type,
moves, and passive skills.
ch0062_00_karin/0602_0701_04_10:
Knowing that your opponent uses Dark types
isn’t enough. Getting to know your own Pokémon
and forming a strategy around that is key.
ch0062_00_karin/0602_0702_01_10:
A lot of people think that Dark-type Pokémon
don’t play fair and square because of the way
their move names sound.
ch0062_00_karin/0602_0702_02_10:
But understanding move effects and utilizing
your Pokémon’s strengths isn’t something that’s
unique to Dark types. Not by a long shot!
ch0062_00_karin/0602_0702_03_10:
I hope that you learn something about Dark-type
tactics when we battle each other.
ch0062_00_karin/0603_0701_01_10:
We all know that type matchups can give you a
huge advantage in a Pokémon battle...
but they’re not always a must.
ch0062_00_karin/0603_0701_02_10:
Once, I was challenged by a Trainer who
insisted on battling with the first Pokémon they
ever received, regardless of type matchups.
ch0062_00_karin/0603_0701_03_10:
The first time we battled, I was victorious,
but the next time they challenged me, they
beat me fair and square.
ch0062_00_karin/0603_0701_04_10:
In the end, type matchups may be important,
but sometimes victory can be achieved using
something more precious than that.
ch0062_00_karin/0603_0702_01_10:
I admire a Trainer who can stand firm
and stick to their beliefs.
ch0062_00_karin/0603_0702_02_10:
It may be a bit self-centered, sure, but it
means they’ve got the power to do
something great. I like that.
ch0062_00_karin/0604_0701_01_10: Hmph... I guess you’re not half bad.
ch0062_00_karin/0604_0701_02_10:
Unless my eyes deceive me, I think that
Pokémon of yours is going to be
great someday.
ch0062_00_karin/0604_0701_03_10:
Pokémon grow so much stronger when they
know their Trainers love them, you see.
ch0062_00_karin/0604_0702_01_10:
It’s rare that another Trainer
catches my interest.
ch0062_00_karin/0605_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], your Pokémon
looks...so very dashing today.
ch0062_00_karin/0605_0701_02_10:
You and your Pokémon have the same
spark in your eye, you know.
ch0062_00_karin/0605_0701_03_10:
Remember the way you feel right now,
and use that positivity to propel you forward.
ch0062_00_karin/0605_0702_01_10:
I like to measure up my opponents, then
take them down with the perfect counterattack.
ch0062_00_karin/0605_0702_02_10:
It seems like you’ve already found your own
battle style as well.
ch0062_00_karin/1701_0701_01_10:
Have you been using your items effectively?
Here, you can have this.
ch0062_00_karin/1701_0701_02_10:
It’s a present. It’s a, uh... *giggle*
Well, you’ll see.
ch0062_00_karin/1701_0702_01_10:
How do you like your present?
I’m sure it’ll come in handy for you.
ch0062_00_karin/1701_0702_02_10:
Knowing how and when to use items
during a battle is key.
ch0062_00_karin/2501_0701_01_10:
There’s no such thing as a strong Pokémon or
a weak Pokémon, as far as I’m concerned.
ch0062_00_karin/2501_0701_02_10:
Every Pokémon is unique in its own way—
it’s up to the Trainer to figure out how
best to utilize that.
ch0062_00_karin/2501_0701_03_10:
Any trait can be turned into an advantage
as long as you love and encourage
your Pokémon.
ch0062_00_karin/2501_0702_01_10:
Even if some people might call them weak,
I never give up on the Pokémon I love.
ch0062_00_karin/2501_0702_02_10:
It’s precisely because I love them that
I’m able to see all of the good in them.
ch0062_00_karin/2501_0702_03_10:
Then again, I’m sure none of this comes
as a surprise to you.
ch0062_00_karin/2511_0701_01_10:
If you’re someone who gets caught up in the
desire to win so much that it drains the fun
out of battling for you...
ch0062_00_karin/2511_0701_02_10:
sorry, but you’re failing as a Trainer.
That sort of mind-set is just not OK.
ch0062_00_karin/2511_0701_03_10:
Why, you ask? Because the battles that are
fun for both you and your Pokémon are the
ones that will lead you to victory.
ch0062_00_karin/2511_0702_01_10:
You should always have fun when you’re
battling, no matter what.
Sometimes that’s easier said than done...
ch0062_00_karin/2511_0702_02_10:
but I get the feeling that’s not an issue for you.
I can see that you and your Pokémon have
mutual trust and affection in spades.
ch0062_00_karin/2511_0702_03_10:
Just stay true to yourself and continue to
have fun battling just the way you are.
ch0062_00_karin/2511_0702_04_10:
One day, maybe we could face each other
in a spectacular battle as well—you doing
what you do best and me doing the same.
ch0062_00_karin/3001_0701_01_10:
I’m not really a morning person, you know?
I’m doing my best just to keep my eyes open.
ch0062_00_karin/3002_0701_01_10:
It’s not good to sleep in late, you know.
I suppose that’s your prerogative, though.
ch0062_00_karin/3003_0701_01_10:
Have you eaten yet?
A healthy meal before battle is key.
ch0062_00_karin/3004_0701_01_10:
As soon as the clock hits noon,
my Pokémon is itching for battle.
ch0062_00_karin/3005_0701_01_10:
The starry sky is such a wonder.
I could gaze up at it all night.
ch0062_00_karin/3006_0701_01_10:
I do love the night...but it’s never good for
a lady to miss her beauty sleep.
